name: Snoks
description:
Your socks are running away and you have to pair them, but the crocs are waiting for you!

Play this arcade alone or sharing the controller with a friend! Each trigger controls one foot and you have to coordinate the inputs to move fast. You have to pair two socks correctly to win, the crocs will try to eat you but you can kick them away!

Keyboard inputs(not shown but they exist, even if the game tells you otherwise) are:

-W and Up arrow to move forward each foot

-Left/Right arrow or A/D to rotate the camera

-S or Down arrow to kick

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2021
